articles.description: Louis van Gaal has fired back at Dutch reporters after Holland's style of play was questioned following their 2-0 win over Qatar. His side secured top spot in Group A to move to the last-16.
articles.content:
Louis van Gaal has fired back at Dutch reporters after Holland's style of play was questioned following their 2-0 win over Qatar.

articles.author: Amie Wilson
articles.title: Kolo Toure sends message to Khun Top and Brendan Rodgers after Leicester City exit - Leicestershire Live
articles.description: The latest Leicester City news as the coach has left the club in order to take up a managerial position with Championship side Wigan Athletic.
articles.content:
Former Leicester City coach Kolo Toure has thanked the club as well as chairman Khun Aiyawatt 'Top' Srivaddhanaprabha and manager Brendan Rodgers for his time at the club.

articles.author: Isabel Baldwin
articles.title: Tiger Woods appears to hint he is closing in on retirement as he admits he may only play majors - Daily Mail
articles.description: Woods made a fairytale return to golf at The Masters in April, just 14 months on from the car crash that almost cost him his right leg but revealed he physically can't cope with more than the majors.
articles.content:
Tiger Woods appeared to concede that he may not be able to play much longer as he continues to suffer with the injuries he sustained to his right leg. 
The 15-time Major champion made a fairytale re… [+2931 chars]
